content: So basically, we have no idea what is going on. Many mouths speak many lines.Do we listen to Trump, McMaster, Tillerson, Haley, Jared or Steve? Which comments on which day carry any weight?This is what to expect from a lying liar/fake fact President.This is what to expect from a deliberately uninformed President.So wonderful to have a new White House drained of those horrible entrenched DC elites! Who needs a State Department?
